name: biomni-query-openfda
title: Biomni: Query Openfda
description: Query OpenFDA for FDA-regulated product data including drugs, adverse events, device recalls, and food safety.
content:
Overview

Searches openFDA providing public access to FDA data including drug labeling, adverse event reports, enforcement actions, recalls, and registration information for drugs, devices, and foods.

Input Parameters

  • prompt (string, optional): Natural language query about FDA data
  • endpoint (string, optional): Specific openFDA endpoint
  • max_results (integer, optional): Maximum results
  • verbose (boolean, optional): Enable logging

Biological Use Case

Important for pharmacovigilance and drug safety monitoring. Researchers use openFDA to analyze adverse event patterns, identify safety signals, study recalls, compare safety profiles, and inform clinical decisions and regulatory policy.

Output

Returns JSON (openfda_results.json) with adverse events, patient outcomes, drug labeling, recalls, enforcement actions, device classifications, and registration details with metadata.

Category

database
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/database/query_openfda.py --prompt "${prompt}" --endpoint "${endpoint}" --max_results "${max_results}" --verbose "${verbose}" -o "${outputDir}"
